channel.title: Drops for mopar
channel.description:
if ur using angel source greaters drop scimmys hope u guys fixed drops for it just saying [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/407/mopardrops.png/][IMG]http://img407.imageshack.us/img407/4930/mopardrops.png[/img][/URL]

item.title: Drops for mopar
item.dc:creator: @Botox Botox
item.description:
@Botox wrote:

I think people are confusing the lack of rune items in game with their existence. If i remember correctly, rune items were ALWAYS in the game, however noone had them unless they aquired them and said nothing until Blurose13x achieved rune smithing.

Read full topic

item.title: Drops for mopar
item.dc:creator: @Nothing1 -Nothing
item.description:
@Nothing1 wrote:

[quote=“Crys, post:29, topic:432176”][quote author=Rodgerwilco link=topic=534887.msg3912763#msg3912763 date=1328912739]

Rune has been around since the start of the game…

bout 99% sure it was added in after the launch of the game.

yes because they named a game called RUNEscape without having the “rune”
[/quote]

imo you’re retarded

Run/escape[/quote]
It has been stated hundreds of times that Runescape is Rune/Scape and not Run/Escape. And you should know that by just looking at their logo ‘Rune Sword Scape’.

Oh and rune was idd added after launch.
/thread

Read full topic

item.title: Drops for mopar
item.dc:creator: @RSCShadow RSCShadow
item.description:
@RSCShadow wrote:

[quote=“Rodgerwilco, post:19, topic:432176”][quote author=Dgc2002 link=topic=534887.msg3912267#msg3912267 date=1328861380]

Rune has been around since the start of the game…

bout 99% sure it was added in after the launch of the game.
[/quote]

yes because they named a game called RUNEscape without having the “rune”[/quote]Actually they have. It was called “RUNEScape” because of the magic rocks.

http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/Update:Dragon_quest_online!

Only heroes who have proven themselves worthy by completing this quest can purchase and wear the best armour in the game. The new rune platemail body!

item.title: Drops for mopar
item.dc:creator: @SamanthaSoul SamanthaSoul
item.description:
@SamanthaSoul wrote:

[quote=“Kaibutzu, post:11, topic:432176”][quote author=cyndibal link=topic=534887.msg3911945#msg3911945 date=1328832036]

But for the sake of the gameplay, IMO, no rune items should be dropped before people can make them.
[/quote]-1 to a terrible idea, it will takes months on 2x before anyone gets 99 smithing. fuck going months with addy

rune was not in shop intill after they could make it tho[/quote]

Doesn’t matter. Rune also didn’t exist for a while before it was finally put in after Addy.

At the very least let it drop from high level mobs semi-regularly, but putting it in store is fine too.

Read full topic
